io.github.mrblobman.nbt

Class SerializationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mrblobman.nbt.SerializationContext

  • public class SerializationContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The SerializationContext contains serializers, deserializers, and the factory used by them all. An NBTSerializer or NBTDeserializer can and should delegate serialization of complex types to this context that will find the appropriate NBTSerializer or NBTDeserializer for the job. Each should only be responsible for the name of the key that the complex type is at and the primitive fields (including strings and lists of primitives).

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        public <T> T deserialize(NBTBaseTag tag,
                         java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Deserialize the tag into an object of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the object represented by the serialized tag
        Parameters:
        tag - the raw data tag
        type - the class of the serialized object
        Returns:
        the deserializer object
        Throws:
        NBTDeserializationException - if a deserializer cannot be found for the given type or the deserializer throws an exception.

      • serialize

        public NBTBaseTag serialize(java.lang.Object data)
        Serialize the given data as an NBTBaseTag.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to serialize
        Returns:
        the serialized form of the data
        Throws:
        NBTSerializationException - if a serializer for the class of the data cannot be found or an exception is raised during serialization.

      • serialize

        public <T,S extends T> NBTBaseTag serialize(S data,
                                            java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Serialize the given data as an NBTBaseTag
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the serializing data, think of this as the type to down cast to
        S - the type of the data, it must be T or a sub class of T
        Parameters:
        data - the data to serialize
        type - the class that the serializer is able to serialize
        Returns:
        the serialized form of the data
        Throws:
        NBTSerializationException - if a serializer for the given type is not found or an exception is raised during serialization.

      • canDeserialize

        public boolean canDeserialize(java.lang.Class type)
        Check if this context is able to deserialize the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the class of the object to deserialize
        Returns:
        true if this context can attempt to deserialize an object of class type, false otherwise.

      • canSerialize

        public boolean canSerialize(java.lang.Class type)
        Check if this context is able to serialize the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the class of the object to serialize
        Returns:
        true if this context can attempt to serialize an object of class type, false otherwise.

      • factory

        public TagFactory factory()
        Obtain the tag factory used in serialization and deserialization. This method is designed for use by NBTSerializers and NBTDeserializers as the context is always passed with a serialization or deserialization request.
        Returns:
        the appropriate TagFactory for wrapping and instantiating tags.
